resources.string:
6 Years Of Experience as a barber
I offer a classic barber shop experience while providing a broad range of classic and modern barber services. If you are looking for a great classic cut, a clean fade, or the best shave in Durban, I got you covered. For the ladies, I am proud to be the home of some of greatest stylists who are not only known for great cuts, but some of the best color jobs in the area
Hello guys, I am Nathi Mazibuko from Kwa-Mashu. I am a barber based in Durban.
Hello guys, I am Suraj from Chirner. I am barber of the Barber Shop Market.
Hello guys, I am *NAME* from *PLACE*. I am Barber/Stylist of the Barber Shop
